# Education

\footnotesize
```{r education, results='asis'}
read_csv("education.csv") %>%
  mutate(degree = paste0("\\textbf{", degree, "}")) %>% 
  unite("edu", degree:dates, sep = ", ") %>% 
  pull(edu) %>% 
  cat(sep = "\n\n")
```

```{r}
read_csv("education.csv") %>%
  detailed_entries(.protect = TRUE,
    what = university,
    when = dates,
    with = degree,
    where = location
  )
```
